decision_conditions: Given the addition of metel shutters, if you can please agree to the following revised description: 'Variation of condition U0172448 Approved Drawings of planning permission 20/3420/FUL (The demolition of existing pavilion building and replacement with a single storey community pavilion to accommodate a cafe and kiosk, community space, storage space for sports equipment, public toilets and ancillary storage space) - to remove the rooflights and overhanging roof canopy, the addition of solar roof panels to the roof, and new metal shutters including visible timber low level plinths to which they are fixed to.'
description: Variation of condition U0172448 Approved Drawings of planning permission 20/3420/FUL (The demolition of existing pavilion building and replacement with a single storey community pavilion to accommodate a cafe and kiosk, community space, storage space for sports equipment, public toilets and ancillary storage space) - to remove the rooflights and overhanging roof canopy, the addition of solar roof panels to the roof, and new metal shutters including visible timber low level plinths to which they are fixed to.
